arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton welcome West Ham to their new Hill Dickinson Stadium fortress on Monday, aiming to bounce back from a disappointing week. A shock Carabao Cup exit to a struggling Wolves side followed a narrow derby defeat at Anfield, halting the Toffees’ recent momentum ahead of this fixture. arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United will begin life under new manager Nuno Espírito Santo on Monday night with a trip to face David Moyes’ Everton at the Hill Dickinson Stadium. The Hammers dramatically sacked Graham Potter on Saturday, with Nuno taking charge of a side sitting 19th in the table.
